metadata.title: Azure AI Developer Bootcamp
metadata.subtitle: 5 Days That Will Transform Your Career Forever
metadata.description: This isn't just a course - it's a career accelerator. In just 5 intense days, you'll go from AI curious to AI expert, building the skills that will make you the most sought-after developer in the industry. Companies are desperate for developers who can turn AI ideas into reality, and this bootcamp will make you that developer.
prerequisites: A burning desire to become an AI developer
Basic programming skills (we'll teach you the rest)
The courage to push through 5 intense days of learning

highlights: Build 5 production-ready AI applications in 5 days
Master the AI skills that pay $150k+ annually
Join an exclusive community of AI innovators
Get hired by top tech companies worldwide

overview.summary: Imagine walking into a job interview and confidently saying 'I built 5 AI applications last week.' That's the reality of this bootcamp. We're not here to teach you theory - we're here to transform you into the AI developer that companies are fighting over. You'll code from 9 AM to 9 PM, break through mental barriers, and emerge as someone who can turn any AI idea into working software. This isn't comfortable learning - this is the intense, life-changing experience that separates the AI developers who get hired from those who don't.
objectives: Master every Azure AI service and when to use each one
Build custom machine learning models from scratch
Deploy AI solutions that can handle millions of users
Create computer vision systems that rival commercial products
Develop NLP applications that understand human intent
Launch a portfolio of AI projects that will get you hired
overview.targetAudience: This bootcamp is for developers who are serious about becoming AI experts. If you're tired of being a junior developer and want to become the person who leads AI initiatives, if you want to command six-figure salaries and work on cutting-edge projects, if you're ready to push through discomfort to achieve extraordinary results - this bootcamp will change your life. No more 'I wish I could build AI' - you'll actually do it.

modules.title: Azure AI Services Deep Dive
modules.description: Master Azure Cognitive Services and AI APIs
objectives: Build NLP applications with Azure Language
Create conversational AI with Azure Bot Service

sections.content:
Azure AI Services Architecture

Learn the architecture and capabilities of Azure AI services, including Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, and Azure AI platform components.

sections.title: Key AI Services
items: Azure Computer Vision for image analysis
Azure Bot Service for conversational AI
Azure Form Recognizer for document processing

labs.title: AI Services Integration Lab
labs.description: Build applications using multiple Azure AI services

modules.title: Custom Machine Learning with Azure ML
modules.description: Build and deploy custom ML models
objectives: Set up Azure Machine Learning workspace
Prepare and process data for ML

sections.content:
Azure Machine Learning Workflow

Master the complete ML lifecycle using Azure Machine Learning, from data preparation to model deployment and monitoring.

labs.title: Custom ML Model Development Lab
labs.description: Build and deploy a complete ML solution

sections.content: Advanced computer vision techniques for building intelligent image processing applications, from basic classification to complex object detection and tracking.

labs.title: Computer Vision Project Lab
labs.description: Build a complete computer vision application

modules.title: Natural Language Processing and Generative AI
modules.description: Advanced NLP and generative AI development

sections.content:
NLP and Generative AI

Master advanced natural language processing techniques and build applications using generative AI models and Azure OpenAI Service.

labs.title: NLP and Generative AI Lab
labs.description: Build advanced NLP and generative AI applications

modules.title: Production Deployment and MLOps
objectives: Set up CI/CD pipelines for ML

sections.content: MLOps practices for deploying and maintaining AI solutions in production environments, ensuring reliability, scalability, and continuous improvement.

labs.title: Production Deployment Lab
labs.description: Deploy and monitor AI applications in production

includes: Access to Azure AI development environment

instructor.name: Yaïr Knijn
instructor.title: Principal AI Architect
instructor.bio: Yaïr is a Principal AI Architect with extensive experience in building production AI systems. He has led numerous AI projects from concept to deployment and specializes in Azure AI platform and MLOps practices.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert

resources.title: Azure AI Samples Repository
resources.description: Code samples for Azure AI development

certification.name: Azure AI Developer Bootcamp Certification
certification.description: Demonstrate mastery of Azure AI development, custom ML model building, and production deployment of AI solutions

faq.question: What programming languages are used?
faq.answer: The bootcamp primarily uses Python for AI development, with some JavaScript for web integration. All code samples and labs are provided.

faq.question: Do I need my own Azure subscription?
faq.answer: While having your own subscription is beneficial for continued learning, we provide Azure credits for all lab exercises during the bootcamp.

faq.question: Is this bootcamp technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a highly technical bootcamp requiring programming skills and AI knowledge. It's designed for developers who want to build production AI systems.

faq.question: What projects will I build?
faq.answer: You'll build multiple projects including a computer vision application, NLP chatbot, custom ML model, and a complete AI-powered web application.
